meanings.definition: A person who cheats at card games.
meanings.sent1: The cardsharps were caught trying to cheat during the poker game.
meanings.sent2: The group of cardsharps were known for their dishonest tactics in card games.
meanings.sent3: The cardsharps thought they could outsmart everyone, but their tricks were soon discovered.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the cardsharps lurking in the shadows, ready to deceive unsuspecting players.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cardsharps scheming at the table was etched in his memory.
